mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (content, rate, reserve_id, write_date, reply) VALUES (#{review.content}, #{review.rate}, #{reserve_id}, sysDate, '')
mapper.select: SELECT r.reply, r.rate, r.content, rs.memId as memId, m.profile as profile, r.write_date as writeDate FROM REVIEW r JOIN RESERVE rs ON r.reserve_id = rs.reserve_id JOIN Member m ON m.memid = rs.memid JOIN SPACE s ON s.space_id = rs.space_id AND s.space_id = #{space_id}
